Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: What if we also checked an environment variable that would override the release and thirdparty settings of the package.json ? The script that calls the 'gulp test' would have toÂ 'export `FABRIC_SDK_RELEASE=latest` and `FABRIC_SDK_THIRDPARTY=latest`
